Package com.baylor.se.lms.controller

Class BookController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.baylor.se.lms.controller.BookController
  • @CrossOrigin(origins="*")
@RestController
public class BookController
extends java.lang.Object
    Book Controller handles all request concern with BOOK entity. All CRUD operation along with book request, issues and return is handled by it. It uses various service like BookService, BookLoanService and BookCategoryService.

      • getBooks

        @GetMapping(path="/books",
            produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Book>> getBooks()
        Handles GET request to fetch all the books. Produces JSON response with all books
        Returns:
        Response with list of book

      • getBook

        @GetMapping(path="/books/{id:[0-9][0-9]*}",
            produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Book> getBook​(@PathVariable
                                                             java.lang.Long id)
        Handle GET request to fetch single book of given id. The Id is passed as path variable
        Parameters:
        id - : Book Id (Path variable)
        Returns:
        JSON Response with Book records

      • addBook

        @PostMapping(path="/books/",
             consumes="application/json",
             produces="application/json")
@ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Book> addBook​(@RequestBody
                                                             BookDTO book)
        Handles POST request to create new book. Consumes JSON with Book records.
        Parameters:
        book - : Book information with specification in it.
        Returns:
        JSON response with created Book record

@ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<SearchDTO>> searchBooks​(@RequestParam(required=true)

        Handles GET request to search for books. It gets query values from the URL.
        Parameters:
        q - : Query to be searched
        Returns:
        List of books specification as JSON response
